headline: Armada Hoffler Announces Eva T. Hardy, Lead Independent Director, Will Retire From the Company’s Board of Directors
summary: Hardy provided significant contributions to the Company throughout her decade of serviceVIRGINIA BEACH, Va., June 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Armada Hoffler (NYSE: AHH) today announced that Eva Hardy, who has served on the Company’s Board of Directors since 2015 and as lead independent director since 2022, will retire from the Board in accordance with the mandatory retirement age policy instituted by the Company in 2024. “I am proud of my decade of service on Armada Hoffler’s Board of Directors

headline: Dominion Energy: Strong Buy On Data Center Demand And Regulatory Tailwinds
summary: Dominion's unmatched data center-driven load growth and rider-recoverable capex ensure double-digit EBITDA gains and premium valuation upside. See why D stock is a Buy.

headline: This Utility Stock is Well-Positioned to Benefit from the AI Boom
summary: Dominion Energy, Inc. (NYSE:D) is counted among the Best Nuclear Energy Stocks to Buy Right Now. The company is well-positioned to take full advantage of the ongoing AI boom as it serves the world’s largest cluster of data centers in northern Virginia. Moreover, it is currently building a large offshore wind farm in the state […]
